title: Am I allowed to cancel my GGives loan?
content:

You can request a cancellation or refund of your GGives loan IF:

- The **merchant's refund or cancellation policy allows you** to return or refund the item/s you purchased
- You **are able to initiate your request** before your GGives loan due date and within **30 calendar days** from the date of your transaction
- **100% of the** **transaction amount must be for cancellation**

### To cancel a GGives loan, hereâ€™s what you can do:

1. Coordinate with the partner merchant for your refund/GGives payment cancellation request
2. Once everything is settled with the merchant, they can contact GCash via the dedicated support channels given to them

If your loan cancellation request is **beyond 30 calendar days from the transaction** or **the request is for a partial refund only**, the amount for refund (equal to your loan amount) will be counted as **an advance payment to your GGives loan**. You will receive any excess amount to the remaining loan in your GCash wallet.
